summary: The Toyota Corolla is a popular small car made by Toyota since 1966. It became the world's top-selling car by 1974 and has been a big seller ever since. With over 50 million sold by 2021, it surpassed the Volkswagen Beetle as the best-selling nameplate globally. The name "Corolla" means "small crown" in Latin. Early models were rear-wheel drive, but most modern Corollas are front-wheel drive. It has faced competition from other compact cars like the Nissan Sunny and Honda Civic.
title: Toyota Corolla
